imdb.plot outline: PopSource TV is the source for Entertainment News, Pop-Culture Tidbits, mix-it-up exclusives, celebrity co-hosts, with a lively mix of coverage and behind the scenes access, with no gossip or dishing. PopSource TV captures the true to life representation of the entertainment industry and therefore we feature people of all ages, and diversified clips of interviews, red carpet coverage, and interactive features.
imdb.title: PopSource TV
plot: _PopSource TV_ (qv) is the source for Entertainment _News_ (qv), Pop-Culture Tidbits, mix-it-up exclusives, celebrity co-hosts, with a lively mix of coverage and behind the scenes access, with no gossip or dishing. _PopSource TV_ (qv) captures the true to life representation of the entertainment industry and therefore we feature people of all ages, and diversified clips of interviews, red carpet coverage, and interactive features.
